meanings.definition: Loss of the sense of smell.
meanings.sent1: Anosmia can make it hard to enjoy the smell of flowers.
meanings.sent2: She experienced anosmia after catching a cold.
meanings.sent3: The chef with anosmia mistook salt for sugar in the recipe!
meanings.sent4: In a world of anosmia, the aroma of coffee would be a distant memory.
meanings.sent5: The anosmia in the room was so strong, even the most pungent scents went unnoticed.

meanings.definition: The absence of the sense of smell.
meanings.sent1: Without anosmia, she could savor the fragrance of fresh bread.
meanings.sent2: His anosmia made it difficult to detect gas leaks.
meanings.sent3: The anosmia at the perfume store was a blessing for those with allergies.
meanings.sent4: Anosmia turned the world into a silent movie of scents.
meanings.sent5: The anosmia in the forest was like a cloak, hiding the odors of nature.
